microsoft-sovereign-cloud.environment.de.message: The Sovereign Cloud to use for authentication. If you select `custom`, you must also set the `#microsoft-sovereign-cloud.customEnvironment#` setting.
comment: The `#microsoft-sovereign-cloud.customEnvironment#` syntax will turn into a link. Do not translate it.

microsoft-sovereign-cloud.customEnvironm.message: The custom configuration for the Sovereign Cloud to use with the Microsoft Sovereign Cloud authentication provider. This along with setting `#microsoft-sovereign-cloud.environment#` to `custom` is required to use this feature.
comment: The `#microsoft-sovereign-cloud.environment#` syntax will turn into a link. Do not translate it.

microsoft-sovereign-cloud.customEnvironm: The name of the custom Sovereign Cloud.
The portal URL for the custom Sovereign Cloud.
The management endpoint for the custom Sovereign Cloud.
The resource manager endpoint for the custom Sovereign Cloud.
The Active Directory endpoint for the custom Sovereign Cloud.
The Active Directory resource ID for the custom Sovereign Cloud.
